import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import ReactPlayer from 'react-player'; import '../../src/player.css'; import '../../src/player.js'; function VideoPlayer({ url }) { const VideoElement = useRef(null); const container = document.querySelector('.video-contain'); const togglePlay = () => { const videoElem = VideoElement.current; videoElem.paused ? videoElem.play() : videoElem.pause(); } const PlayFunc = () => { container.classList.remove('paused'); } const PauseFunc = () => { container.classList.add('paused'); } useEffect(() => { document.addEventListener('keydown', e => { const tagName = document.activeElement.tagName.toLowerCase(); if(tagName === "input") return switch(e.key.toLowerCase()) { case " ": if(tagName === "button") return case "k": togglePlay() break } }) }, []) return (
0:00
/
); } export default VideoPlayer;
